import _toConsumableArray from"D:/THANH/WedBitex/bitex-front-end/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/toConsumableArray.js";import*as types from'../type/index';import{findIndexEI,search}from'../../hooks';var initialState=[];var reducerBill=function reducerBill(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;var type=action.type,payload=action.payload;var temp=-1;switch(type){case types.GETBILLL:payload?state=payload:state=[];return _toConsumableArray(state);case types.UPDATE_STATUS_BILL:var date=new Date();var y=date.getFullYear();var m=date.getMonth()+1>9?date.getMonth()+1:"0"+(date.getMonth()+1);var d=date.getDate()>9?date.getDate():"0"+date.getDate();temp=findIndexEI(state,payload.id);if(temp!==-1){state[temp].Status="1";state[temp].DocumentDate=d+"-"+m+"-"+y;state[temp].StaffCode=payload.staff;state[temp].Quantity=payload.number;}return _toConsumableArray(state);case types.FITER_STATUS:state=search(state,payload);return _toConsumableArray(state);case types.RESET_BILL:state=[];return _toConsumableArray(state);case types.GET_BILL_BY_STAFF:payload?state=payload:state=[];return _toConsumableArray(state);case types.GET_BILL_BY_STAFF_UPDATE_BILL:temp=findIndexEI(state,payload.id);if(temp!==-1){state[temp].Status="1";}return _toConsumableArray(state);default:return state;}};export default reducerBill;/**
